import React from 'react'; const ProductCard = ({ product, isFavorite, onToggleFavorite, onViewDetails, onEdit, onDelete, }) => { return (

{product.name}

{product.category}

Model: {product.model}

Color: {product.color}

Storage: {product.storage}

Stock: {product.stock}

RM{product.price}

); }; export default ProductCard;
